title: Sprout Pencil
subTitle: This pencil will grow into a plant after his normal use.

marketingArguments.title: Sustainable & Biodegradable
marketingArguments.speech: Designed with natural materials: wood and biodegradable seed capsule.

marketingArguments.title: A pen that never stops living
marketingArguments.speech: Write, draw, design, as far as you can and plant it upside down after that. Take care of the growing plant that will come out.

marketingArguments.title: 8 pencils, 8 different plants
marketingArguments.speech: Each pencil contains a different plant seed: Parsley, Thyme, Basil, Sage, Perilla, Lucky grass, Mint and Thales.

specifications.label: Plant varieties
specifications.value: Parsley, Thyme, Basil, Sage, Perilla, Lucky grass, Mint, Thales
